intents.name: Physical Presence Required
intents.response: Physical presence is not required to set up a company at Meydan Free Zone.

intents.name: Share Capital Requirements
intents.response: No paid-up share capital is required to incorporate a company at Meydan Free Zone.

intents.name: NOC Required
intents.response: NOC (No Objection Certificate) is not required to incorporate a company at Meydan Free Zone.

intents.name: Zero Visa License
intents.response: Yes, you can get a license with zero visa allocations at Meydan Free Zone.

intents.name: Combine Activities
intents.response: Yes, you can combine commercial, professional, and trading activities on the same license. The combination of activities is permitted.

intents.name: Documents Upon Incorporation
intents.response: Upon incorporation, you will receive: Business License, Certificate of Formation, Share Register, Memorandum of Association, and Lease Agreement.

intents.name: Maximum Shareholders
intents.response: A maximum of 100 shareholders are permitted on the license. If a company has more than 6 shareholders, they will need to pay AED 2,000 for each additional shareholder beyond the initial 6. For example, if a company has 10 shareholders, they will need to pay AED 8,000 (AED 2,000 x 4) in addition to the standard licensing fees.

intents.name: Maximum Directors
intents.response: A maximum of 4 directors are permitted on the license.

intents.name: Maximum Managers
intents.response: A maximum of 1 manager is permitted on the license.

intents.name: Free Activities During Incorporation
intents.response: You can incorporate the company with 3 groups of activities without any additional charge.

intents.name: Additional Activities Cost
intents.response: The cost of adding additional activities to the license is AED 1,000 per activity. Approvals are required only for regulated activities.

intents.name: Multi-Year License Discount
intents.response: For multi-year license applications (2 or more years for license and visa allocations), there is a standard discount of 15%.

intents.name: Partner in Multiple Companies
intents.response: Yes, you can be a partner or shareholder in multiple companies.

intents.name: After License Application Submission
intents.response: After submitting the new license application on the Meydan portal, the shareholders, manager, and directors will receive an email to complete KYC, Accept/Reject, and Compliance form (if applicable). Only once these tasks are completed, our team will receive the application to review and proceed.

intents.name: License Validity Period
intents.response: Clients can choose the license validity during incorporation. The maximum period of validity is 10 years.

intents.name: License Renewal After 10 Years
intents.response: Yes, you can renew your license after the 10-year period expires. The renewal process allows you to extend your license for another term.

intents.name: Free Amendment Multi-Year License
intents.response: Yes, if the company holds a multi-year license, they will get a free amendment. For example, if a company has a 2-year license, the company will get 1 free amendment.

intents.name: License Grace Period
intents.response: A 30-day grace period is provided from the license expiry date to renew the license.

intents.name: License Penalty Fee
intents.response: Yes, there is a penalty fee of AED 500 if the license is not renewed during the grace period. This is a one-time fee.

intents.name: Immigration Card Grace Period
intents.response: No, there is no grace period provided when the immigration card expires.

intents.name: Immigration Card Penalty
intents.response: Yes, the penalty fee for an expired immigration card is AED 250 per month from the immigration card expiry date.

intents.name: Share Capital Fractions
intents.response: No, the share allocation and the total share capital cannot be a fraction. It must be a whole number. For example, it cannot be 45.50%, it must be either 45% or 46%.

intents.name: Company License Address
intents.response: The address mentioned in the company license is: Meydan Grandstand Next to Meydan Hotel, 6th floor, Meydan Road, Nad Al Sheba, Dubai, U.A.E.

intents.name: Audit Financial Statement
intents.response: You are required to submit the Audit Financial Statement Declaration report at the time of license renewal.

intents.name: Convert LLC to Branch
intents.response: No, it's not possible to convert an LLC to a Branch or a Branch to an LLC.

intents.name: Shop Outside Meydan
intents.response: No, you cannot have a shop outside the Meydan Free Zone area. You need to have a shop within Meydan Free Zone area.

intents.name: Change License Address
intents.response: Yes, you can change the address in the business license, however, that address must be in the Meydan Free Zone area ONLY.

intents.name: Chamber of Commerce Certificate
intents.response: No, a Chamber of Commerce certificate will not be issued automatically. However, Meydan Free Zone can assist you in registering for the Chamber of Commerce, but a process fee will be applied.

intents.name: Hold Property Under Company
intents.response: Yes, you can hold a property under your Meydan Free Zone company.

intents.name: Visa Allocations Available
intents.response: 6 visa allocations are available to the company by default.

intents.name: DET Permit with General Trading
intents.response: No, it is not possible to get a DET permit while having General Trading activity. The company needs one of the 44 mainland activities.

intents.name: What is Immigration Card
intents.response: The immigration card is the card you apply for to register your company details in the immigration system. It's mandatory to apply for it before applying for an employment or investor/partner visa.

intents.name: What is Visa Allocation
intents.response: Visa allocation is the visa quota in immigration. It's mandatory to apply for it before applying for an employment or investor/partner visa.

intents.name: Immigration Card and Visa Allocation Validity
intents.response: Immigration card and visa allocation have the same validity as the business license.

intents.name: Company Name Change Publication Time
intents.response: If you're applying for a license amendment to change the company name, the publication time is 14 days.

intents.name: Company Provide Own MOA
intents.response: The company can't provide its own MOA. However, if they want to add/remove/edit any clause in Meydan MOA, they can request it, and it will be subject to legal approval.

intents.name: Renewal with Amendment Fees
intents.response: There are no extra fees required for 'Renewal with Amendment' unless you add a 4th activity group.

intents.name: Corporate and Employee Letters Validity
intents.response: The validity of corporate and employee letters is 30 days.

intents.name: Board Resolution Validity
intents.response: The board resolution must be valid for 15 days during application submission on the portal.

intents.name: Cancel License After Expiry
intents.response: If the company wishes to cancel its license after the license has expired and after the grace period, the company will not have to pay a penalty fee for the license. However, if the company has an immigration card, they need to pay the immigration card fine.

intents.name: Renew Visa Allocation Mid-Year
intents.response: Yes, the visa allocation validity holds the expiry date of the License. Hence, it should be renewed annually along with the Business License and Immigration Card, even if the Visa Allocation was availed in the middle of the year.

intents.name: Immigration Card Amendment After Name Change
intents.response: Yes, the company must apply for an immigration card amendment once the company name is changed.

intents.name: Shareholder Age Limit
intents.response: There is no minimum and no maximum age limit for shareholders.

intents.name: Share Capital Min Max
intents.response: There is no minimum and no maximum share capital requirement.

intents.name: Inside UAE for Residence Visa
intents.response: An applicant has the option to process the Entry Visa outside the country. However, when the E-visa is issued, the applicant needs to be inside the UAE to complete the medical and Emirates ID procedures.

intents.name: Entry Visa Validity
intents.response: The entry permit is valid for 60 days from the date of issuance.

intents.name: Change of Status Validity
intents.response: The change of status is valid for 60 days from the date of issuance.

intents.name: Original Passport for Visa
intents.response: Visa stamping is no longer mandatory, as per the new regulations in the UAE. The electronic version will suffice as Residency proof. You don't need to submit your original passport.

intents.name: Residence Visa Before Biometrics
intents.response: Yes, you can submit the Residence Visa Application through the Portal. You may fill out and sign the Emirates ID declaration form for us to proceed with the Residence visa issuance before Biometrics.

intents.name: Biometrics Time After Declaration
intents.response: If you fill out and sign the Emirates ID declaration form to proceed with the Residence visa issuance before Biometrics, you have 60 days to complete the Biometrics.

intents.name: Investor Visa Minimum Age
intents.response: The minimum age for an investor/partner visa is 18 years. You must have AED 50,000 share capital in the company to apply for an investor/partner visa.

intents.name: Investor Visa Maximum Age
intents.response: There is no age limitation for investor/partner visa. You must have AED 50,000 share capital in the company to apply for an investor/partner visa.

intents.name: Employee Visa Minimum Age
intents.response: The minimum age for an employee visa is 18 years.

intents.name: Employee Visa Maximum Age
intents.response: The maximum age for an employee visa is 60 years.

intents.name: Dependent Visa Age
intents.response: The minimum age for a visa is 18 years. If your child is under 18, they wouldn't qualify for an employment visa. However, there may be options for dependents. Would you like me to connect you with our team to discuss your specific situation?

intents.name: Office Timing
intents.response: Meydan Free Zone operates 24/7.

intents.name: Office Location
intents.response: Meydan Free Zone office is located next to Meydan Hotel, Meydan Grandstand, 6th Floor, Meydan Rd, Nad Al Sheba 1, Dubai, UAE.

intents.name: Use Meydan PO Box
intents.response: It's not allowed for clients to use Meydan's P.O. Box number. However, clients can apply for their own P.O. Box number through Meydan Plus.

intents.name: Delivery to Meydan Address
intents.response: Meydan Free Zone will not receive any delivery on the client's behalf unless they register for Mail management services.

intents.name: Shared Desk Location
intents.response: The Meydan shared desk office is located at Meydan Grandstand, 6th floor, Meydan Road, Nad Al Sheba, Dubai, U.A.E.
